summary: AN ORDINANCE increasing certain objects of expenditure in Program Categories "Data Processing System and Programming" (Code 4100) and "Data Processing Operations" (Code 4200) in the 1975 Budget of the General Services Department for operation through December 31, 1975 of the City's Data Processing Program by reappropriation and transfer from Program Category "Management and Budget" (Code 1200) in the 1975 Budget of the Executive Department.
